website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for street games with your elementary-age child.
pros: Rubber, but with a real leather feel
Great on concrete and asphalt Designed for outdoor use

customer_reviews.title: good size and durablity for kids
customer_reviews.text: great for a 4 - 6 yo old team. from a coach of kids team. the surface is an outdoor one, good nibs. you can get a softer ball if you like such as the "rookie gear" model (I think the rookie gear is spalding, just search rookie gear on amazon) if you want a softer kids ball, because outdoor mikasa one is a bit rough textured, when it inadvertly is passed into another kids face, has enough texture to leave a bit of an ouchy. just depends on what you want, more of an outdoor texture or a softer style. both are great
customer_reviews.author: V.V.GO-12

customer_reviews.title: The description does say RUBBER.
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to read the description that it’s a RUBBER ball. The picture on AMAZON makes it look like it has some additional “padding” like a leather ball. But it’s like a elementary recess type ball. I feel like th picture they used for the ball isnt the same ball
customer_reviews.author: COOK

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay fully pumped beyond 5 mins
customer_reviews.text: The ball will NOT stay fully pumped up. I pump it, my kid loved it, 5 mins later, it’s lost enough air that she cannot practice dribbling anymore because it doesn’t bounce as well, so won’t play with it. There are no holes in it, not damaged in any way to the naked eye. Not sure if we got a dud, but would not recommend this ball unless you want to pump up a ball every 5 mins till you lose your mind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Used 1 time then will not hold air... waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these, one for each of my sons. Just gave them to them as an end of school year gift and after one day of use, maybe 2 hours, one of them will not hold air. Would have returned but purchased on April 1st and could only return until May 1st. Waste of money, manufacturer defect maybe? Or just cheap... still expected it to last more than 1 use.
customer_reviews.author: SDS

customer_reviews.title: Ball Deflates Very Quickly, Do Not Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these balls, they very quickly deflate and the problem has gotten worse the more we use them. We have to blow them up after every use and its getting harder and harder to blow them up. I would definitely like my money back, but there seems to be no way of doing that. I definitely do not recommend anyone purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner Ball
customer_reviews.text: Good beginner ball. It has a lot of bounce to it once pumped up slightly more. It's on the lighter side so it's perfect for my little brother, who just likes to shoot around. We have a basketball hoop outside, it has taking a beating and still holding up pretty well. Definitely worth the money if you need a back up ball or a ball for someone just starting to get into basketball. This ball is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Fruit Snacks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 4 year old, he loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My son just started taking basketball lessons. Not surprisingly he's not very good at dribbling yet or shooting but this ball seems fairly well made. It came with a little less air and I prefer more so I pumped it up a bit. That is personal preference and anyone with a ball should have their own pump anyway since all balls lose air over time (though this ball seems to keep air pretty well once you get to where you want it). The grip is really good, it's very cheap, and overall super satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: M. Ning

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor balls
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these balls to go with the new basketball hoop I bought on Amazon. I have two girls who are too small for a full sized basketball and I wanted something durable given that they will be left outside. These Mikasa balls work perfectly. They came, unwrapped, in the same box. Both needed a little bit of air for a proper bounce. I am pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: ThomasTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: It came 10 days too late and it will not hold air.
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived 10 days after the listed delivery date and it will not hold air. It goes flat over night and becomes soft after just an hour or so. We picked up another ball from an actual store. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: JFINN

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball for Younger Children
customer_reviews.text: This is the size basketball (Size 4 - 25.5") my 6 year old son's Upward Basketball team uses. It is tough to find in local sports stores, but certainly worth the effort to order. The smaller size fits his hands and allows him to develop better ball skills. It also makes it easier to shoot, which makes him have more fun and want to practice more often. We have had this for over a year, use it outside and store it in a garage and it is still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: ALS

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, basic bball for driveway
customer_reviews.text: Was 2 weeks late in delivery. Ball is your basic, cheap driveway ball. It gets the job done I guess, but there are better balls for the same price out there at your local big box short. Ball came flat...aired it up...is just a touch lopsided but is useable.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great sized ball for kindergarteners
customer_reviews.text: This size ball is perfect for kindergarten team my partner is helping coach but difficult to find in any store. The ball appears to be pretty well made so far but we only ordered one to start with as it is more expensive than other balls we were looking at geared for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Gizmo

customer_reviews.title: My 6-yer-old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: For this for my kindergartner and he loves this ball. The smaller size makes it easier for him to dribble and gives him confidence. He literally plays basketball every day! Good value, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kcs seattle

customer_reviews.title: Actually stays pumped up--sort of
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ball again b/c it was the only 1 I had this size that does not need to pumped up EVERY time you use. Still needs pumping up, but holds air longer than other balls. Way less annoying.
customer_reviews.author: arizona123

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 6 year old son who is just starting to play basketball. The ball arrived fully inflated. It appears to be a quality product. We paid less than $10 for it, so I think it is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Adam's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: It had a slow leak. So every time we want to use it we have to pump it up.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality basketball
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nephew so he could practice his dribbling. It is a well made ball but is a lot smaller than I was expecting. I guess I should have read the dimensions a little better. That’s not the sellers fault tho. It gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for my 5-year old as he jumps into his first season of playing. It's good quality, doesn't lose air, and is a blast for my son to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Kerryp

customer_reviews.title: Good outdoor for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far the ball seems good. It takes one to two sessions for it to feel like it is settled in and not have some random bounces. Ball seems to perform well for me. No real complaints for the price
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Doof

customer_reviews.title: Good rubber basketball
customer_reviews.text: Solid rubber ball . I bought it for my kids school and as of a couple months it’s still holding up . It’s better than the cheap ones that are prizes at places for sure .
customer_reviews.author: jonathon burnett

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my basketball loving toddler
customer_reviews.text: My five year old son is in a toddler basketball class that uses this size ball. Can’t beat the price and the ball is perfect for practice
customer_reviews.author: SKM724

customer_reviews.title: Constantly deflating
customer_reviews.text: Great size for kids but always deflates after 1 day. Will not hold air.
customer_reviews.author: EastBronxGuy

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, went flat very quickly
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 7 year old son's birthday. Size is perfect. However, after about a month it starting going flat between uses. Now it won't even hold air long enough to play for 30 mins. Seems like its just poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I am very frustrated with this purchase, the ball arrived loose (no box) in an Amazon shipment and proceeded to lose air very quickly after we would inflate it. I unfortunately waited a month to see if it continued to be an issue and when the I realized it was an issue with the ball, I tried to reach out for support, I had missed my window. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.text: Got this my Four year old. Note that it does not go thru a little Tikes basketball net BUT great for him to practice his dribble and shoot in other types of goals. Great toddler preschool size.
customer_reviews.author: Shoeaholic

customer_reviews.title: Not an outdoor ball for dirt driveway
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 4 of these over the past year and each one has eventually sprung a small leak. They say they are outdoor balls, but I guess you can't play in a dirt driveway. The last 2 I bought started to leak within a few days of playing. Time to find another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Basket ball
customer_reviews.text: Great exercise for me a grandmother to get out and throw hoops with grandchildren
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: This is the size 4 ball you came here for.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and a Wilson size 4 to compare. This is the better choice. Better feel, and cover is more comfy. Looks like itll hold up better too. Stop looking, buy it now.
customer_reviews.author: Kalamazoo Jim

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter is starting basketball and they train with this size ball. Could only find it online. Works great for little hands. It’s a perfect training tool and helps with the frustration of larger gear
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is a great rubber ball
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great rubber ball. It has a really good textured finish to it that comes close in feel to that of a quality leather ball. You can see quality control issues with the graphics as the "Mikasa" emblem is crooked and the black lines aren't painted outside of the embossing in places, but if you can look past the cosmetic flaws, its worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: M. Beatty

customer_reviews.title: won't hold air
customer_reviews.text: Ive tried to fill it up over 5 times and it wont hold air. What is wrong with this product? Had to buy a different basketball which worked flawlessly
customer_reviews.author: t9933

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The basketball seemed fine when it arrived but after about 2 weeks of normal use by my young children, it deflated and would no longer hold air when I pumped it up. It was completely deflated and I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basketball
customer_reviews.text: It's an outdoor basketball that the neighborhood kids are using. It bounces, and rolls, so it works!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for small hands
customer_reviews.text: perfect size for small hands, my son is finally getting the hang of dribbling because of the size of this ball...perfect Disclaimer: I DID NOT receive this item at a discounted rate, I paid the full going price at the time of purchase and my review was NOT influenced in anyway (feel I should make this disclaimer these days).
customer_reviews.author: Gempic

customer_reviews.title: Great ball, comes inflated
customer_reviews.text: We have tried other youth balls and they come deflated, never bounce right, and all leaked with barely any use. This ball has lasted and came inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Wall M

customer_reviews.title: gift for nephew
customer_reviews.text: purchased for nephew as a gift. Ball seems to be in good condition was packaged properly and he appeared to enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Adams

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old granddaughter loves to practice her dribbling skills
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is now 6 and continues to use this basket ball to practice her dribbling. She loves this basket ball.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bball for elementary kids
customer_reviews.text: Size 4 ball hard to find. No issues -ball arrived in in a plastic bag inside a box. Was slightly deflated -pumped up and no leaks. It's perfectly round and found no mfg issues. Happy Customer.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: So sweet
customer_reviews.text: I’m a middle aged man who loves to buy youth sized basketballs. After a tiresome search for the perfect youth sized basketball at a reasonable price, BOOM, here it is. Now excuse me while I learn how to play basketball.
customer_reviews.author: Boomer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality ball
customer_reviews.text: Delivery went to my mailbox instead and shipping took a while but worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Elassal

customer_reviews.title: Looks much lighter and the material not as nice as images
customer_reviews.text: Looks much lighter and the material not as nice as images
customer_reviews.author: amz what what

customer_reviews.title: Nice basketball. Good price. Hard to find youth size.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. My 6.5yr old used it for his youth league games and he had no problem gripping or dribbling the ball. I loved that it came inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Fatima

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Ball seems well made. Good bounce, holds air well. Good grip. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: MyTwoCents

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for youngsters
customer_reviews.text: Nice little sturdy basketball for the money. Keeps kids busy and out of trouble.
customer_reviews.author: The Addict Shoppe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect youth size
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it, won't stop shooting baskets. Well made and durable, will last many years until he outgrows the youth size.
customer_reviews.author: Ron J.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good quality "rubber" (not leather) basketball for the price. Kids like it. Smaller size makes it easier for my kids to use.
customer_reviews.author: C Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great smaller sized ball for 5-6 year olds.
customer_reviews.text: Great smaller ball for kids 5-6 years old. Stronger 4 year olds may be able to get it to a 6-7 foot rim. This looks like a real basketball to the kids and is larger than the miniballs but still light enough for them to shoot without ruining their shot by having to overcompensate. It made well enough to last
customer_reviews.author: Sjd1

customer_reviews.title: Quality ball at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Only reasonably affordable size 25.5 ball (Sz 4) Decent soft touch feel. Son was able to manipulate and pick up dribbling skills much easier than with a 27.5 ball. Great choice for 4-6 year olds easier to handle and pick up skills.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Won’t hold air.
customer_reviews.text: We waited about 2 weeks longer than the initial estimated arrival date for this basketball. When it did finally show up, we discovered it doesn’t hold air. Unless you want to inflate the basketball every time your kids want to play with it, I’d highly recommend you stay away from this ball.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, punctured by a toothpick on floor
customer_reviews.text: My son dribbled the ball on a wood tooth pick lying on floor, then the ball was punctured. Very poor quality. It's after only 2 weeks' of very mild use.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a small basket ball great for 4-6 year olds
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Just ok. The price was right, but no matter what, even when I add air to it, it just doesn’t bounce as high as a normal ball would.
customer_reviews.author: brooke

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice ball perfect for my 6 yr old and the jr hoop we have in the basement- jr I don’t mean ‘super small’ about reg size bball and hoop -
customer_reviews.author: freeses

customer_reviews.title: Excellent feel!
customer_reviews.text: This ball was a great deal and doesn't feel cheap at all. Excellent grip and perfect size for younger kids. Our 4 and 6 yr olds love it
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a five or six-year-old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sized basketball for my five-year-old (now six) to practice with. She wanted to take a basketball class over the Summer and it was just the right size for her to dribble and shoot (on a lower hoop) with. She still practices with it in the backyard sometimes. It will need to be pumped up once in a while, but so will any basketball.
customer_reviews.author: yakusoku

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold air
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't hold air. Everytime you use this ball you need to pump it up. Used it twice and now it sits partially deflated not being used.
customer_reviews.author: Teaman

customer_reviews.title: It’s small, meant for small kids
customer_reviews.text: It’s small. Fits my 6-year old perfectly. I thought It was an adult sized ball but I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Des

customer_reviews.title: Loses air
customer_reviews.text: Or ball loses air each week, between practices, so we have to air it up each time. A bit frustrating, but otherwise a good ball for the cost and purpose
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our 8 year old. Handles well and holds air.
customer_reviews.author: Reading Student

customer_reviews.title: Seen a full winter and spring and summer and into a fall of daily playground play with tweens.
customer_reviews.text: Almost a year of all weather rain sleet snow baking sun daily schoolyard play. Haven’t even had to air after the initial inflation.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Nice Youth Basketball
customer_reviews.text: Great motivator for students to play around with and get some exercise at recess.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for young kids
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for young kids!! My 6-year-old loves this ball. We've had for about a month now and no issues whatsoever. He likes that it's more his size. It's easier for him to dribble and shoot. Great for teaching small hands ball handling skills.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Sabala

customer_reviews.title: good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: It is Small size, and good quality, The kid love to play with it
customer_reviews.author: xXWaterLemonXxo

customer_reviews.title: Great ball, Women's Sized
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why it's called compact. The ball is 28.5" which is the standard size for women's basketball ie: high school, college and pro. Came in great condition and was a definite steal for the price. I might end up buying more, I'm short; I can use a lady sized ball.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 6 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 6 year old. Exact size for the Upward Basketball Program. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: S&K

customer_reviews.title: Great youth ball for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. Perfect size for youth. Ball has good texture then some other rubber balls. Has held up well on driveway after lots of use
customer_reviews.author: Brian Vezina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for NJB
customer_reviews.text: So thankful to have found this ball. It’s our first season of NJB and this size ball (25.5) is not available in any store near us! Perfect siE and perfect weight for my six year old :)
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Herrera

customer_reviews.title: they feel like very high quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of these, they feel like very high quality. Very easy to grip too. They arrived deflated - not that it bothers me, but I figured I would state this because others have said they arrived inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable for outdoor (concrete) use
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping this ball would be durable on concrete (outdoors), but it’s already losing its grip just a few weeks after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl O.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite ball during practice!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes that she’s able to get a good grip on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Royal Loyal

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for beginners
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice size basketball.It is decent for the price. However, I've had to fill it up every day since we received it. Sometimes twice a day and I feel like eventually it will stop holding air.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: good ball
customer_reviews.text: no complaints, exactly what I would expect at that price point.
customer_reviews.author: C. R. Connor

customer_reviews.title: Great for teaching them young
customer_reviews.text: Great for teaching them young. Don't start your 4-5 year old off with a me s size ball. The price is good, but wish I had the option to buy in a non rubber indoor material also for those days we work inside the gym
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for your big kid. Seems to be durable and the price is right
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find ball size used by 4 year olds. Good quality. Nice grip. Better than you would find on many children basketballs
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Isse

customer_reviews.title: This is as good as I could find online
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for this size ball, you have a K-1 grader playing upwards basketball. This is as good as I could find online. Its an indoor / outdoor basketball, and not much more.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For My 6 Year Old
customer_reviews.text: Great basketball for my 6 year old as she's just starting to learn the game. Much easier to learn the right way to shoot the ball with a smaller, lighter ball. The ball was a bit smaller then I thought, but it will work and when she gets it down, we'll move up to a size 5 ball. The ball is just a bit larger then a mini basketball. Seems like a good product though. I recommend it for 6-8 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Elsen

customer_reviews.title: Size 25 is hard to find. But it's the perfect size for 8 and below
customer_reviews.text: This Basketball, size 25, I couldn't find in any store in my area. It is perfect for my young kids.
customer_reviews.author: Christine A Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Basketball
customer_reviews.text: This is a good ball. I bought 1 and then proceeded to buy 2 more because its a good ball at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael & Haley Myers

customer_reviews.title: Good name Bad product
customer_reviews.text: After 2 weeks of playing, this ball became egg shaped, very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel to the surface
customer_reviews.text: This ball feel different than other kid's basketball. It feels more like real basketball. The weight and bounce are nice. Very good for actual training.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. consumer

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect size for his small hands
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this basketball for my 6 year old son. It is the perfect size for his small hands. It is easy to inflate if a little low and has a nice grip.
customer_reviews.author: Joy M

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Received the ball on the 1st. By the 3rd it was FLAT. Haven’t even gotten a basketball hoop yet. My 8 y/o daughter is deviated bc her current dream is basketball player
customer_reviews.author: Kelcie E.

customer_reviews.title: Okay ball but the air valve is poor. Air valve failed within weeks
customer_reviews.text: Okay ball but the air valve is poor. Air valve failed within weeks. We now have to inflate the ball before we play and then take a break in the middle of the game to reinflate the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Ashok D.

customer_reviews.title: Good starter ball.
customer_reviews.text: Got this ball for my toddler who loves basketball and it was a really good purchase. Good size for 3 year olds, still somewhat inflated 8 months later.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Be ready to reinflate on delivery - then be fully satisfied! Lol
customer_reviews.text: Great little ball - size needed for little dribblers and much less expensive than the one coaches recommend from Dicks sporting goods! Arrived a little deflated but that was an easy fix, it's held up perfectly after being practiced with in our rough concrete driveway for a few weeks
customer_reviews.author: MLE

customer_reviews.title: Size 4 (25") Upward Basketball League Ball
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son just joined the Upward basketball league. They use a 25" basketball for practice and games. Trying to find a 25" basketball is harder than it sounds. Every sporting goods store I went to had 27.5" basketballs and up. This small difference doesn't sound like much, but there is a reason the little league basketball players use a Size 4 (25") basketball, there hands are small! This is the right size, well made, and is Upward league sized! It also came already aired up, small detail, but it allowed my son to immediately start playing with it! I do recommend this Size 4 basketball!
customer_reviews.author: CPS

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My son likes this basketball, it has held up great and he is rough on things. I like that it is just the right size for him and he can dribble and hold it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Cutler

customer_reviews.title: I guess so
customer_reviews.text: A little high in pice for a basketball of this size, but limited availability in stores makes this the best deal you can get.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Queen

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for our daughter
customer_reviews.text: Perfect ball. Feels good and great price. Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality product
customer_reviews.text: Received on time. It’s actually a little smaller than I thought it would be. Very nice quality product. Excellent size for a 5yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: I had a tough time looking for a basketball for ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a tough time looking for a basketball for my young son, but finally found this one. At 6, he was not able to use the normal child size in a proper manner (i.e. shooting with one hand), but is now learning with this one that allows him to handle something smaller and more proportional. It even came pumped up.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty Brown

customer_reviews.title: Compact size = 28.5 simple as that!
customer_reviews.text: Went back and forth whether to order compact size (thinking it was the smallest size being offered)... The reviews from folks were confusing (just be explicit) compact size is 28.5 (not what a 3 year old wants)... Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Karisha Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Nice feels.
customer_reviews.text: I play a lot myself and I wanted something nicer than "rubber" but somehow these guys make the rubber feel softer and mold the seams in a way to make it feel more like my Evo. Good ball for little ones who have trouble tossing the size 5's up o 8 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Good ball, good grip, good on concrete and asphalt.
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for my kindergartner to play with in the driveway. Good grip and holds up on cement well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Lee

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for Upwards Basketball
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size for Upwards Basketball. This is my son's first year playing Upwards basketball and this is the size they use. These are the same balls the use in his elementary school as well. Amazon was the best place I could find to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: robert-n-stephsyv

customer_reviews.title: The Deflater.
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold air. Will deflate during normal use and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold it's air
customer_reviews.text: It won't keep air. Keeps going flat... yes, I lick the needle. I have to pump it back up every time my kids play.
customer_reviews.author: D. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson enjoys the basketball. Perfect size for a 5/6 year old
customer_reviews.author: bobb23

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold air
customer_reviews.text: Maybe mine was just defective. Didn't hold air. Went for a brand name instead.
customer_reviews.author: Val

product_meta.title: Mikasa BX1000 Premium Rubber Basketball
product_meta.description: Tired of your girlfriend telling you to get in touch with your feelings? Perhaps you just don't have the feel that everyone does yet. Maybe you don't get to practice in ideal conditions outside. Every superstar can use a little help sometimes. The deep pebble design of this Mikasa is just enough help not to be a hinderance and could mean the difference when making that delicate finger roll to the hole. Now your passes will hit your mark and that crossover will be seamless. Specs: Official men's size and weight. Deep pebble cover. 1-Year Warranty
feature_bullets: Item may require inflation to achieve proper tension
For optimal performance, additional inflation may be required. Ball pump not included.
